name: TurnSignal
description: A minimalistic, intuitive, visual, IN-GAME utility for keeping track of Cord Wrapping/Tangling in SteamVR!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: ( Same As Vive System Requirements, should run on most rigs just fine. )
